ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?
ygData.msgSnippet: Believe me or not, Dex has no effect on the number of attacks you will get. It affect critical strikes and weapon procs, thats it. (sk dont get critical hits)
ygData.messageBody:
Believe me or not, Dex has no effect on the number of attacks you will get.
It affect critical strikes and weapon procs, thats it. (sk dont get critical
hits)
Agility will effect your AC, which to me is your primary concern, AC. As i
said, imo, go AC then STR then AGI...
Bronze, after bronze its darkforge armor, or perhaps EB breastplate... Then
its umbral...
Weapon wise go with a Bibs, then a dark reaver then a myth 2 hander...


----- Original Message -----
From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 10:51 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?


> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> <snip>
> IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing weapon...Go
AC
> first, then STR, then agility..
> <snip>
>
> Personally, Dex to me is not worthless. Anything that allows me to strike
> even one more time each minute is worth it. Especially with Double Attack.
> But that is symantics and I do not want a "word war" over it. :-)
> I agree that raw AC comes first. Strength has more impact after 20.
Agility
> is up in the air for me. Not quite sure what effect it has.
>
>
> What armor under Darkforge and Planes armor is best for an SK? I am
working
> on getting some bronze armor, and not blackened because of the lower AC.
> What is better than bronze and what would I expect to pay for it? Or what
> MoB/level/zone is it in.
> I am ignorant as to "good" items as I normally wander Norrath with my
/ooc,
> /auction, /shouts turned off. It is quite peaceful like this, no punk
> kiddies acting tough and cursing each other out across the zone. But I
> digress.
>
> My druid just hit 26 and I am looking into getting equipment for my SK.
All
> I need is to be pointed in the right direction. Any and all help is
> appreciated.
>
> Thanks in advance.
>
> --
> Lasombra Shadowfiend
> 1st Tier of Hate
> (Sitting on the newbie repop log with my newbie equip, staring at the
murky
> forrest)
